biolockj.module.seq

Class PearMergeReads

  • java.lang.Object
    • biolockj.module.BioModuleImpl
      • biolockj.module.ScriptModuleImpl
        • biolockj.module.seq.PearMergeReads
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    BioModule, ScriptModule

    public class PearMergeReads
extends ScriptModuleImpl
implements ScriptModule
    This BioModule will merge forward and reverse fastq files using PEAR.
    For more informations, see the online PEAR manual: https://sco.h-its.org/exelixis/web/software/pear/doc.html

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected static String EXE_PEAR
      Config property "exe.pear" defines the command line PEAR executable
      protected static String EXE_PEAR_PARAMS
      Config property "exe.pearParams" is used to set the PEAR executable runtime parameters
      protected static String FUNCTION_PEAR_MERGE
      Name of the bash function that merges files with PEAR: "mergeReads"
      static String NUM_MERGED_READS
      Metadata column name for column that holds number of reads per sample after merging: "Num_Merged_Reads"

    • Method Detail

      • buildScript

        public List<List<String>> buildScript(List<File> files)
                               throws Exception
        Build the script lines for each sample as a nested list. PAIR program will be called once for each pair of files to output a single merged read.
        Specified by:
        buildScript in interface ScriptModule
        Specified by:
        buildScript in class ScriptModuleImpl
        Parameters:
        files - List of module input files
        Returns:
        List of nested bash script lines.
        Throws:
        Exception - if error occurs generating bash script lines

      • checkDependencies

        public void checkDependencies()
                       throws Exception
        Validate module dependencies
        1. Verify input files are in fastq format
        2. Verify matching paired reads are found
        3. Validate required Config.EXE_PEAR property
        4. If running a restarted pipeline that already merged reads, set paired indicator to false
        Specified by:
        checkDependencies in interface BioModule
        Overrides:
        checkDependencies in class ScriptModuleImpl
        Throws:
        Exception - thrown if missing or invalid dependencies are found

      • cleanUp

        public void cleanUp()
             throws Exception
        Set Config."internal.pairedReads" = "N" and register number of reads.
        Specified by:
        cleanUp in interface BioModule
        Overrides:
        cleanUp in class BioModuleImpl
        Throws:
        Exception - thrown if any runtime error occurs

        public String getSummary()
                  throws Exception

      • getWorkerScriptFunctions

        public List<String> getWorkerScriptFunctions()
                                      throws Exception
        This method generates the required bash functions used by the worker scripts: "mergeReads"
